author: Elle82
title: Basic yet useful
review: This was my first ever set of lego, there wasnt much to build with, but it had some nice pieces that with a little imagination you could turn into something great. Basic yet functional, couldve done with a larger base plate

author: Wipipi
title: Very Peaceful Little Set
review:
I recently purchased this set for my sister for her birthday. I chose this set because it's cheap, cute, and comes with great fun! Let's talk about the Pros and Cons.

Pros

  • They really thought about the play value of the set while designing it all those years ago. You can play with the seesaw, slide your figures down a slide, dig in the sand box, and so much more!
  • There's some pretty nice pieces for such a small set. It even comes with three figures and a retro style carriage!
  • You get two baseplates, which can be very useful.  
  • My sister always loves getting parrots in sets.

Cons

  • Not really much to say. Instead of using two small baseplates they could of made it one medium sized baseplate and added more to the set, but that would make it more pricey. 

Overall, I do think this is a very good set, for it's size and value. It's focused more towards younger folk, but it does the job. If you can find this set complete for under 20 dollars (Like I did), I definetely recommend buying it!
